main event: Several sightings of unidentified flying objects (UFOs) were reported near Minot Air Force Base, North Dakota, on October 7, 1968, with multiple witnesses including B-52 crew members.
interesting points: A B-52 crew reported a radar blip at speeds estimated at 3,000 mph,The radar and visual reports indicated the presence of a bright object accompanied by significant electromagnetic effects, including equipment malfunctions aboard the B-52,14 other witnesses also reported similar sightings,One of the witnesses described the object as a bright, orange-hued light with a sound similar to a jet engine,Investigations suggested that the phenomenon could be attributed to plasma, potentially caused by atmospheric conditions.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects emitting bright lights
witnesses: military personnel including crew of a B-52 and security guards
